SailPoint Consultant 
Tjginjupalli23@gmail.com                                                                                   
+1(903)-415-0729 
LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/ravi-ginjupalli-592055168 
   
 
Position: SailPoint Developer/Engineer 
Professional Summary 
• 7 years of IT experience, specializing in SailPoint IIQ for 6+ years. 
• Proficient with SailPoint versions 7.1 to 8.2. 
• Configured  applications  using  various  connectors  (Active  Directory,  JDBC, LDAP,  Webservices)  and 
collaborated with app teams for SailPoint IIQ onboarding. 
• Developed custom rules for Identity IQ, including aggregation, provisioning, connector, and segregation 
of duty policy rules using Java and Bean shell. 
• Designed and implemented custom access request forms, workflows, tasks, and reports. 
• Implemented Policy Enforcement and Life Cycle Manager Process automation.

• Designed and implemented custom access request forms, workflows, tasks, and reports. 
• Implemented Policy Enforcement and Life Cycle Manager Process automation. 
• Extensive  knowledge  of  LCM  request  and  event  configuration  with  strong  development  skills  in  Java, 
J2EE, HTML. 
• Experienced with databases like Postgres, MySQL, MS SQL Server. 
• Managed post-implementation tasks and worked with various methodologies (Agile, SDLC, waterfall). 
• Possesses strong communication, interpersonal skills, a positive work attitude, self-motivation, and quick 
learning aptitude. 
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
Programming Languages C, Java, SQL 
Operating Systems Linux, UNIX, Windows and Mac 
Web Technologies HTML5/4,  CSS3,  UX,  XHTML,  Bootstrap,  SOAP, 
JSP 
IDE Eclipse, My Eclipse, Notepad++, Excel 
Scripting Bean Shell, Java Script, Powershell 
Unit Testing Junit 
IDM SailPoint IIQ 7.1,7.2 p2, 8.0p4, 8.2p2 
Build Tools Maven & Apache Ant (SSB Build) 
 
EDUCATION:

Scripting Bean Shell, Java Script, Powershell 
Unit Testing Junit 
IDM SailPoint IIQ 7.1,7.2 p2, 8.0p4, 8.2p2 
Build Tools Maven & Apache Ant (SSB Build) 
 
EDUCATION: 
• Master’s in computer and information science from SAU, Magnolia, Arkansas, USA. 
• Bachelor of Computer Science Engineering from VLITS, Vadlamudi, Andhra Pradesh, India. 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
 
Huntington National Bank, Columbus, Ohio                                         August 2023 – Present 
Role: Identity Access Management Engineer 
• Part of a team assigned to remediate MRA for deprovisioning user access at HNB. 
• Developed  custom  workflows  for  mover  leaver  events  and  integrated  with  Service  Now  for  work  item 
ticket creation using Java Beanshell. 
• Created  custom  rules  using  Java  Beanshell  to  onboard  applications  using  various  out-of-the-box 
connectors. 
• Troubleshot coding errors and addressed any development-related questions from team members.

connectors. 
• Troubleshot coding errors and addressed any development-related questions from team members. 
• Conducted live demos for customers post-successful application implementation, explaining the features.

• Actively engaged in reconfiguring applications to achieve comprehensive connectivity and provisioning 
through SailPoint IIQ. 
 
Equitable, Charlotte, NC                                                                       March 2022 – July 2023 
Role: SailPoint Developer 
• Participated in onboarding client-specific Applications. 
• Developed  build  map  rules,  creation  rules,  and  customization  rules  to  create  Employee  and  Contractor 
user accounts in SailPoint from their current application's exported feed file. 
• Designed and implemented custom solutions in SailPoint. 
• Contributed to creating SOD policies for applications and customized out-of-the-box reports in SailPoint. 
• Enhanced correlation rules for existing connectors to reduce uncorrelated accounts and engaged in various 
Certifications and developed custom tasks. 
• Participated  in  all  SailPoint  deployment  activities  including  connector  configuration,  custom  rule

Certifications and developed custom tasks. 
• Participated  in  all  SailPoint  deployment  activities  including  connector  configuration,  custom  rule 
development, workflow configuration and development, and third-party system integration. 
• Ensured that requirements were gathered, processes defined, and use cases documented followed out-of-
the-box configuration and customization as much as possible. 
• Tested different types of connectors in various environments such as development, UAT, and production. 
• Participated in User Acceptance Testing and bug-related reengineering efforts. 
 
Capital One, Richmond, VA                                                                        Oct 2020 – Feb 2022 
Role: SailPoint Developer 
• Onboarded applications in SailPoint using various connectors available such as Delimited, JDBC, logical, 
and web service connectors. 
• Developed  custom  rules  like  Customization  rule  and  Build  map  rules based  on  different  application

and web service connectors. 
• Developed  custom  rules  like  Customization  rule  and  Build  map  rules based  on  different  application 
requirements. 
• Participated in the SailPoint Upgrade Project from version 7.2p2 to 8.0p4. 
• Initiated manager  certifications and  application owner certifications and  implemented SOD policies for 
different applications as per business team requirements. 
• Created and executed the aggregation task to bulk load authoritative source data from Active Directory, 
Exchange, LDAP, SAP, and others. 
• Developed custom certifications to meet client needs and communicated aspects of both the product and 
the implementation to clients and partners at technical and functional levels appropriate for the situation. 
• Provided knowledge transfer and post-production support activities as necessary. 
• Onboarded applications using APIs. 
• Supported unit testing and UAT testing to ensure the implementation meets requirements.

• Onboarded applications using APIs. 
• Supported unit testing and UAT testing to ensure the implementation meets requirements. 
• Developed custom reports and workflows for client-specific SailPoint Identity IQ implementations in both 
Production and Non-Production environments. 
• Collaborated with various critical application teams to gather requirements for integration with SailPoint. 
• Provisioned application requests in IIQ to Create/Disable/Delete user access for onboarded applications. 
• Identified risks and their root causes to mitigate existing risks in our processes. 
• Worked on developing and enhancing lifecycle events such as Joiner, Leaver, Mover, Rehire, LOA, and 
RLOA. 
 
Environment: SailPoint Identity IQ, J2EE, XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, MySQL, SVN, Web Sphere 
Application server 6.0  
 
UPS, Mahwah, NJ                                                                                         Sep 2019 – Sep 2020  
Role: SailPoint Developer

• Implemented Linux application user attribute display in IIQ access requests. 
• Developed a Native change workflow for auditing user events, sending emails, and displaying attributes. 
• Modified the entitlement catalog to meet customer comments requirements. 
• Actively participated in SailPoint IIQ upgrade from 7.1p4 to 8.0p1. and created a Custom workflow with 
subprocesses to meet client needs. 
• Integrated  ServiceNow  with  SailPoint  and  onboarded  applications  using  APIs  and  developed  custom 
email templates with required identity attributes. 
• Created a Multiplex application for onboarding 50+ applications and customized Build Map rules. 
• Modified JDBC applications to send manual work items to application owners. 
• Enhanced LCM rule library to notify application owners via email and customized reports. 
• Worked on Provisioning Policy for applications. 
• Configured Integration rules for populating users in the Application Database table.

• Worked on Provisioning Policy for applications. 
• Configured Integration rules for populating users in the Application Database table. 
• Implemented Integration Configuration for Certification to display revoked users. 
• Developed code using Agile Methodology and participated in daily status meetings and addressed code-
related issues. 
• Actively involved in client requirement gatherings for applications. 
 
Environment: SailPoint Identity IQ, J2EE, XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, MySQL. 
 
 
 
First Republic Bank, San Francisco, CA                                                  Aug 2017 – Aug 2019 
Role: Identity Engineer  
• Implemented Lifecycle Manager (Joiner and Leaver) Workflows. 
• Onboarded  50+  applications  into  SailPoint  and conducted  Manager  Access  reviews  and  configured 
applications (Authoritative and Non-Authoritative) using AD, Flat file, JDBC, and LDAP connectors to 
load Identity Cubes.

applications (Authoritative and Non-Authoritative) using AD, Flat file, JDBC, and LDAP connectors to 
load Identity Cubes. 
• Built Custom objects for 5 applications to add extra entitlements when users request any entitlements and 
hide users from the Phonebook based on department criteria. 
• Enforced  minimum  character  requirements  for  AD  accounts  and  displayed  sync  messages  to  users  for 
Access Requests. 
• Developed rules like Correlation, Exclusion, Inclusion rules for Certifications. 
• Integrated logical applications into SailPoint. 
• Created Quick links to provide user Roles and Entitlements using the Sunset and Sunrise method. 
• Actively  involved  in  Compliance  Manager,  Certifications  (Access  Reviews),  Role  membership,  Role 
composition, Role, Policy, and Certification configuration for governance compliance. 
• Managed client requirements and configured SailPoint connectors for various applications.

composition, Role, Policy, and Certification configuration for governance compliance. 
• Managed client requirements and configured SailPoint connectors for various applications. 
• Created  custom  reports,  certifications,  and  utilized  bean  shell  scripting  and  workflows  rules  and 
provisioned application requests in IIQ for Create/Amend/Delete user access. 
• Configured Roles, Policies, and Certifications for governance compliance and managed ongoing changes. 
• Participated in status meetings and discussed SailPoint IdentityIQ issues and translated business processes 
into Functional specifications, Workflows, Organizations, Roles, Policies, Resources, and Audit reports. 
• Customized User onboarding processes as per customer requirements. 
• Created advanced certifications using populations and group factory. 
• Implemented  provisioning,  de-provisioning,  end-user  self-service,  and  other  functionalities  for  a  new 
application.

• Implemented  provisioning,  de-provisioning,  end-user  self-service,  and  other  functionalities  for  a  new 
application. 
Environment: SailPoint Identity IQ, J2EE, XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, MySQL. 
 
Wintech Information Systems Pvt Ltd, Hyderabad, India                      Jan 2015 – Dec 2015

Role: Java Developer 
 
• Gathered business requirements and participated in brainstorming sessions and analyzed requirements to 
develop user-focused enhancements. 
• Utilized HTML for website development and completed industrial training in Embedded development. 
• Enhanced existing websites with appropriate naming conventions and coding standards and designed user 
interfaces and applied usability principles to portals. 
• Improved GUI, resolved navigational issues, and supported senior web developers. 
• Managed usability, aesthetics, speed, and communication of websites and utilized Wireframes to outline 
user requirements. 
• Developed  clickable  prototypes  in  HTML,  SOAP,  DHTML,  Photoshop,  CSS,  and  JavaScript  and 
conducted web testing and resolved bugs using Firebug. 
• Provided  maintenance  for  multiple  websites  and  optimized  code  and  tested  websites  across  different 
browsers.

conducted web testing and resolved bugs using Firebug. 
• Provided  maintenance  for  multiple  websites  and  optimized  code  and  tested  websites  across  different 
browsers. 
• Developed  and  maintained  websites  for  events  registration  and  installed  LAMP  server  and  performed 
necessary setup. 
• Created brochure sites, simple forms, and complex search pages interacting with MySQL. 
• Mastered CSS, HTML, and other necessary front-end skills. 
Environment: HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Adobe Photoshop, DHTML, MS Office, Firefox, Windows XP.
